Query: How to create wifi hotspot in Ubuntu 16.04 since AP-Hotspot is no longer working

Answers.MP Summary: APT package handling utility - command-line interface
Answers.Most Similar TLDR Task: Remove all packages that are no longer needed
Top-3 Similar Questions: au_786120: Create hotspot using CLI only - ubuntu 14.04
Top-3 Scripts:
au_786120: sudo add-apt-repository ppa:nilarimogard/webupd8

sudo apt-get update

 sudo apt-get install ap-hotspot

sudo apt-get remove hostapd

Top-3 Similar Questions: au_786120: Create hotspot using CLI only - ubuntu 14.04
Top-3 Scripts:
au_786120: cd /tmp && wget http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/w/wpa   /hostapd_1.0-3ubuntu2.1_amd64.deb && sudo dpkg -i hostapd*.deb && sudo apt-mark hold hostapd

cd /tmp && wget http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/w/wpa/hostapd_1.0-3ubuntu2.1_i386.deb && sudo dpkg -i hostapd*.deb && sudo apt-mark hold hostapd

Explanations about Options.-i:
Install the package. If --recursive or -R option is specified, package-file must
 refer to a directory instead.
